name: Rayman Funpack
summary: Rayman Funpack is a game bundle which includes the original Rayman, Rayman Designer, Rayman By His Fans, English with Rayman and videos of the making of Rayman 2. It was released in Germany in 1999. This bundle also came with some Rayman merchandising like a Rayman 2 poster, 4 Rayman stickers and a Rayman fan-guide.
